message.name: ERR_MILESTONE_FV_START_AFTER_PLAN_START_LT_ZERO
message.locale: Start After Plan Start (days) must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_FV_DURATION_LT_ZERO
message.locale: Duration (days) must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_RV_ADD_MILESTONE_PLAN_TEMPLATE_CANCELLED
message.locale: A milestone cannot be added to a canceled template.
A milestone cannot be added to a cancelled template.

message.name: ERR_RV_MODIFY_MILESTONE_PLAN_TEMPLATE_CANCELLED
message.locale: A milestone cannot be modified on a canceled template.
A milestone cannot be modified on a cancelled template.

message.name: ERR_RV_REMOVE_MILESTONE_PLAN_TEMPLATE_CANCELLED
message.locale: A milestone cannot be deleted from a canceled template.
A milestone cannot be deleted from a cancelled template.

message.name: ERR_XRV_START_AFTER_PLAN_START_LT_EARLIEST_START_DAY
message.locale: Start After Plan Start (days) must be greater than or equal to the Earliest Start Day %1n specified for this milestone.
